channel.title: Strange arm controller issue
channel.description: arm tor controller in physical isolation gateway sometimes asks if i want to clear the log even with no input from me. the terminal is not even the active window - so no accidental keypress. if i say no to prompt, right arrow key asks again if i want to clear log... usually, it goes to page 2 "connections". is this hardware issue, and not whonix issue? like i said, machine is not being touched at all.

item.title: Strange arm controller issue
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I wouldn’t know how anything Whonix does could cause such an issue. Could be defect hardware indeed.

Read full topic

item.title: Strange arm controller issue
item.dc:creator: sirblue
item.description:
arm tor controller in physical isolation gateway sometimes asks if i want to clear the log even with no input from me.
the terminal is not even the active window - so no accidental keypress.
if i say no to prompt, right arrow key asks again if i want to clear log… usually, it goes to page 2 “connections”.
is this hardware issue, and not whonix issue? like i said, machine is not being touched at all.
